Spain: Battle of Écija (1275): Granadan forces routed a Castilian army moving through their territory to meet a Marinid advance.
Indonesia: King Kertanegara of Singhasari launched Pamalayu expedition against Melayu Kingdom in Sumatra. (to 1292)
China: The Yuan general Bayan of the Baarin defeated a Song army led by the chancellor Jia Sidao.
